sentences.en: Venus was arguably a cozier habitat for life than earth.
sentences.cn: 可以说金星是比地球更舒适的生命栖息地。

sentences.en: With Mars the scientific stakes are arguably higher than they have ever been.
sentences.cn: 对于火星来说，科学风险可以说比以往任何时候都要高。

sentences.en: He is arguably the best actor of his generation.
sentences.cn: 按理他是他那一代中最优秀的演员。
